title: Ride
author: twenty one pilots
lyrics:
[00:23.66] I just wanna stay in the sun where I find
[00:27.16] I know it's hard sometimes
[00:30.14] Pieces of peace in the sun's peace of mind
[00:33.41] I know it's hard sometimes
[00:36.38] Yeah, I think about the end just way too much
[00:39.91] But it's fun to fantasize
[00:42.82] On my enemies who wouldn't wish who I was
[00:46.34] But it's fun to fantasize
[00:48.94] Oh, oh, oh, oh
[00:50.71] Oh, oh, oh, oh
[00:52.05] I'm fallin' so I'm taking my time on my ride
[00:56.98] Oh, oh, oh, oh
[00:58.33] I'm fallin' so I'm taking my time on my ride
[01:06.46] Takin' my time on my ride
[01:11.80] 
[01:14.25] "I'd die for you" that's easy to say
[01:16.19] We have a list of people that we would take
[01:17.62] A bullet for them, a bullet for you
[01:19.36] A bullet for everybody in this room
[01:20.97] But I don't seem to see many bullets coming through
[01:22.85] See many bullets coming through
[01:24.36] Metaphorically, I'm the man
[01:25.80] But literally, I don't know what I'd do
[01:27.47] "I'd live for you" and that's hard to do
[01:28.93] Even harder to say, when you know it's not true
[01:30.40] Even harder to write, when you know that's a lie
[01:32.07] There were people back home who tried talking to you
[01:33.75] But then you ignore them still
[01:35.12] All these questions they're for real, like
[01:36.60] "Who would you live for?"
[01:37.55] "Who would you die for?"
[01:38.51] And "Would you ever kill?"
[01:40.27] Oh, oh, oh, oh
[01:42.01] Oh, oh, oh, oh
[01:43.06] I'm fallin' so I'm taking my time on my ride
[01:48.08] Oh, oh, oh, oh
[01:49.39] I'm fallin' so I'm taking my time on my ride
[01:57.57] Takin' my time on my ride
[02:03.65] 
[02:05.90] I've been thinking too much
[02:09.14] I've been thinking too much
[02:12.41] I've been thinking too much
[02:15.51] I've been thinking too much (Help me)
[02:19.18] I've been thinking too much (I've been thinking too much)

[02:39.32] Oh, oh, oh, oh
[02:40.83] I'm fallin' so I'm taking my time
